intro: Brittonastrum mexicanum, commonly known as the Mexican brittlestem, is a flowering plant native to Mexico. Its leaves are often small, linear, and covered in fine hairs, while its flowers are small and yellow, arranged in clusters. Brittonastrum mexicanum is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and limited distribution.
